io.fries.reflection

Class Reflection

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.fries.reflection.Reflection

  • public class Reflection
extends java.lang.Object
    Entry point of the Reflection API.

    Use the of(Scanner) method to create a new Reflection object.

    Then use the various get methods to gather the resources you need.

    Since:
    1.0

        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • getTopLevelClasses

        public java.util.Set<ClassMetadata> getTopLevelClasses()
        Returns:
        A set containing all the top level ClassMetadata from the reflected resources (which mean no inner class is included).

      • getAnnotatedTypes

        public java.util.Set<java.lang.Class<?>> getAnnotatedTypes(java.lang.Class<? extends java.lang.annotation.Annotation> annotation)
        Parameters:
        annotation - The Annotation class that must be present in the returned types.
        Returns:
        A Set of loaded types all annotated with the provided annotation.

      • getAnnotatedTypes

        public java.util.Set<java.lang.Class<?>> getAnnotatedTypes(java.lang.Class<? extends java.lang.annotation.Annotation> annotation,
                                                           java.lang.String packageName)
        Parameters:
        annotation - The Annotation class that must be present in the returned types.
        packageName - The name of the target package.
        Returns:
        A Set of loaded types in the provided package and annotated with annotation.

      • getAnnotatedTypesRecursively

        public java.util.Set<java.lang.Class<?>> getAnnotatedTypesRecursively(java.lang.Class<? extends java.lang.annotation.Annotation> annotation,
                                                                      java.lang.String packagePrefix)
        Parameters:
        annotation - The Annotation class that must be present in the returned types.
        packagePrefix - The prefix of all the targeted packages.
        Returns:
        A Set of loaded types whose package name starts with packagePrefix and are annotated with annotation.
